tool_description: Archives validated air quality data to long-term storage with compression and metadata for future analysis and compliance reporting.

data_to_archive.description: Array of validated sensor readings to archive

compression_level.description: Compression level: none, low, medium, high

error_messages: Data mismatch: data_to_archive and timestamps arrays must have equal length.
Invalid retention period: retention_days must be between 30 and 3650.
Invalid compression level: Use none, low, medium, or high.
Archive capacity exceeded: Data volume exceeds available storage space.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide data_to_archive with corresponding timestamps, specify metric_type and device_id. Optionally set retention_days and compression_level for storage optimization.

records_archived.description: Number of data points successfully archived

expiration_date.description: Date when data will be automatically deleted
